main.name: Patrice DIOUF
main.bio: Hi there! I am Patrice! I've been coding for over 6 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. My focus is  now on Front-end development with more than 4 years of experience designing and implementing IT solutions with complex and high quality UX/UI results. Expert with React/ redux/ hook. Proficient with backlog management, design/build and configure web applications. Always seeking for challenges. Along the journey, I realised my passion existed in delivering high quality, which make me proud. With this passion I built strong trust with the customer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to get more info about me!

education.description: I combined a part time Job as web developer at Ulaval and full time student during the last 3 years of the 4 year program.

Working with Patrice has been AWESOME, he has  strong skill on React's world. He has a great team spirit and so easy to approach
